\section{Conclusions and perspectives}

We have defined several frames and we have discussed the equivalence among them at the Lagrangian level. Furthermore, the Brans-Dicke frame provided a Palatini version of Brans-Dicke theory. Indeed if we promote the connection as independent field in the Brans-Dicke Lagrangian, equation of motions will not be equivalent to the original version.
